Collector Yumi: What? You told her you represented the Dwarf Guild? Oh, dear. That was a mistake... Well, it's over and done with; we can't correct it now. But back to what you were saying about Dr. Chaos' lab - you say that incident was Dr. Chaos' fault? [Quest _114_ResurrectionOfAnOldManager collecter_yumi_q0114_15.htm|Ask about Dr. Chaos.]
